Actions.Name: Oath Sword
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage and winds on hit if the knight is bloody.

Actions.Name: Strike
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is dazed. Dazed foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Stinger
Actions.Description: The Sky knight dashes 2 spaces in a straight line, then deals 3 damage, twice, to an adjacent foe. This action can only be taken if there are no foes adjacent.

Actions.Name: Valiant
Actions.Description: The Sky Knight dashes up to 6 spaces in a straight line, phasing through characters. Foes they pass through take [D], are dazed, then shoved 1 to either side.
